name: Extreme Wipe Out Rush
description: This is a adventure game full of theme park action and adventure run. Who will perform maximum stunts to show his skill. This game test your nerves and skills with different challenging obstacles with tricky puzzles. Are you ready for this crazy stunt challenge?Run,jump and face series of challenging obstacles in each level. Enjoy your play of stuntman on a water course full of crazy dodges and obstacles. A very heart touching and amazing water physics and the man running physics are developed in this legendary game. Multiple level increase more entertainment and also select your favorite character and make the super stuntman.
